website_summaries.verdict: Conditions and makes current hair look its best while regrowing new hair.
pros: 3.4-ounce bottle is a larger size for this type of product
Conditions and detangles current hair and stimulates the scalp to regrow hair
Amazing smell that lasts all day
cons: Product works slowly and conditions the scalp as a means for hair regrowth

website_summaries.verdict: Despite some concerns, this product takes Moroccan argan oil and combines it with other quality ingredients, resulting in superior performance and a loyal fan base of repeat customers.
pros: A popular brand formulated with Moroccan argan oil and fatty acids that earns praise for improving hair's overall condition and texture
We like the light, pleasant scent
cons: A few reports of authenticity concerns
Comes with a pump, which is handy, but known to malfunction

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...Not Real Moroccan Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ORDERED THIS PRODUCT IN THE PAST AND THE REAL MOROCCAN OIL HAIR PRODUCT ARRIVED. THIS TIME IT APPEARS TO BE WATER WITH A LITTLE BIT OF SCENT ADDED. IT ISN'T THE SAME COLOR, SMELL OR TEXTURE AND DOES NOTHING FOR MY HAIR. I DOUBT THERE IS ANY OIL AT ALL. I WASHED MY HAIR THE DAY AFTER USING IT TO GET THE SMELL OFF MY HAIR. I WON'T ORDER AGAIN UNTIL I CAN BE SURE THE REAL PRODUCT WILL ARRIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: The smell was horrible and the oil looked like it was broken down
customer_reviews.text: This had to be an old bottle. The smell was horrible and the oil looked like it was broken down.
customer_reviews.author: Joy L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with Moroccan Oil. I use it in my hair every day. Smells amazing and makes my hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Nattie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product. Expensive, but worth it. First I use the pronexa Bond repair treatment and shampoo, then I treat my hair with this product. The combination of the pronexa bond repair products with the moroccanoil is absolutely amazing. I did not ever think my hair could look like this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Doubts
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I received a fake bottle. I purchased moroccan oil based upon the fabulous reviews and used the bottle in it's entirety. I went to get my hair cut at a salon and my stylist applied a pump of their moroccan oil to my hair at the end of my session. IT WAS COMPLETELY DIFFERENT. The smell and feel of the oil from the salon was phenomenal compared to what I had purchased through Amazon. The moroccan oil hair treatment itself, is great. What I received did nothing for my hair and ... might as well have been vegetable oil with food coloring.
customer_reviews.author: colleenie

customer_reviews.title: As real as it gets 😎
customer_reviews.text: I order this product before my 70$+ bottle that I usually buy at a salon ran out ... I compared it to what I been using and the scent and texture are exactly the same so maybe I got lucky to get the real thing .. I been using this brand for a few years now and I can't say enough it helps my ends stay smooth and frizz free after straightening hair or leaving it curls so yes I would definitely recommend it cuz a little bit like a dime/quarter size goes along way for long hair.👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT the real Moroccan Oil- Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is totally a knockoff oil which is really disappointing. The bottle even looks different when you get it and it has a different language on it. I have been using this oil from salons for years and love the oil itself but this is not the real stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Molz006

customer_reviews.title: This oil smells yummy as I put it in my hair but the smell definitely does not stay like my friends does
customer_reviews.text: I definitely question the authenticity of this Morrocanoil. The packaging is different to my friends and she bought hers in a salon. This oil smells yummy as I put it in my hair but the smell definitely does not stay like my friends does.
customer_reviews.author: Inagh

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff so much. Glad amazon sells it because only certain places sell it and I would rather not drive all around town to find it. I use it after the shower and put a little on my ends and then when I’m all done with my hairstyle to help with the flyaways and smooth the hair. Has a really nice smell to it but it’s definitely not overpowering. Great product and it’s real from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL THING!!
customer_reviews.text: The Moroccan Oil product I received was not the product I am used to or know. It was all wrong - smelled like cheap perfume, watery in consistency, and even a small amount made my hair oily and gross. I should have looked at the reviews before purchasing, which was a major mistake on my part. I was told recently by my hair stylist that only hair salons carry the true Moroccan Oil product and that all others are cheap knock-offs. Not sure if this is true, but either way I am returning mine immediately and purchasing the next ones through a physical retailer I can interact with. Don't make the same mistake I did! Super bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Wereley

customer_reviews.title: SCAM AND FAKE MOROCCAN OIL
customer_reviews.text: This is not authentic Moroccan oil. It does not smell authentic or look/feel authentic. Seems like someone put olive oil in a bottle with a drop of vanilla extract for smell and sold it to me for $15. SCAM AND FAKE.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product!!
customer_reviews.text: A truly outstanding product!!! After a lifetime of looking for something to calm my long, curly hair, that frizzes at the slightest droplet of moisture, my search has finally ended!! This Moroccan Oil is simply the best for smoothing and taming my wild woman hair! Only a small amount is required and it smells terrific! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Traci S.

customer_reviews.title: not the real thing...
customer_reviews.text: Updated review... This product is either expired or fake. Beware of buying salon products from retailers other than salons... I should have known better and not wasted my money. This product makes my hair feel like garbage and is nowhere near the quality of product I've gotten from salons in the past. It doesn't even smell the same. I've been wondering what's wrong with my hair that it continues to feel so dry even though I use this every other day or so, but it's not me, it's because I was fooled by diversion. Google it. Do yourself a favor and buy this from moroccanoil.com or go to a salon. It's the same price anyway...
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff EVERY time I wash my hair and have been for years. It brought my hair back from the brink after some home bleaching and coloring scandals, and now it's used for maintenance but also does a great job of keeping my hair healthy after my routine highlights and coloring. It's heavy so a little goes a long way - I only have to buy every 8 months or so. My hair is shoulder length and I use just a half pump from my ears and down as it will really weigh your hair down if you use it on roots, though you absolutely could to help out damaged hair.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Starlight

customer_reviews.title: No Idea why people are complaining.
customer_reviews.text: No idea why alot of people complain about this product in the reviews, what i have received is exactly like in the picture. no foreign language, no nothing and it works perfectly, I guess it depends on the weather of your country and How much you put. It is made in Israel, so even if it has a foreign language on it, are people buying a product for their hair or discussing politics?
customer_reviews.author: Amir Fetouh

customer_reviews.title: I called Amazon upon receipt of product as the foreign ...
customer_reviews.text: I called Amazon upon receipt of product as the foreign language threw me off and they assured it is 100% original, confirmed it’s made in Israel & it is sold directly by them (that’s the reason for the second star given). Not quite convinced.
customer_reviews.author: jairovega

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  Size pictured is EXTREMELY MISLEADING!
customer_reviews.text: I've used argan oil treatment in the regular 8 ounce size - and thought that was the size I was purchasing: This is a LESS THAN 1 OUNCE TRAVEL SIZE. AND - THIS PRODUCT IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURNS! UGGGHHHHHHH - SO ENRAGING AND FRUSTRATING!
customer_reviews.author: Virgie Bright Ellington

customer_reviews.title: A Little Bit Goes a Long Way
customer_reviews.text: A tiny bit goes a long way! I use less that 1/8 tsp poured into the fingers if other hand. Using both hands’ fingers w/oil on them I lightly distribute the oil throughout the hair with my head down toward the floor for better distribution. I avoid the scalp as not to clog hair follicles. It manages my hair with a healthy shine that gets noticed. Using too much at one time is overkill, wastes the product, and doesn’t give good results in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I am SOOOOO disappointed. I just opened the package this morning after my shower and much to my horror this was NOT EVEN CLOSE to the original!!!! The color and consistency was like baby oil. Clear and runny! Not thick and amber colored like the original. There was NO smell at all. Noy like that sweet muskiness of the original... DO NOY BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Great but bottle is small
customer_reviews.text: The product is great for shining the hair and the scent. It’s not very heavy. The downfall is the bottle was extremely small like a sample size. I didn’t expect that. Maybe I didn’t read the dimensions and only went by the photo. However a little goes a long way so it will probably last for 2 months. If used once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Green

customer_reviews.title: So tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I have always heard of the hype with the Moroccan Oil hair products. After a wine induced prime spree i finally bought this. I was so disappointed. It smells really weird and is so tiny! I wonder if its a dupe but am not sure since this is my first time using it. Will not repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Fake! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t but this. It’s lighter and less thick plus smells weird. Not legit stuff, beware cosmetics online!!!!! I got this a while ago but finally am writing a review because I thought maybe the formula changed which made it such but I got a sample from a friend that was straight from the source and now I know it’s NOT THE SAME OIL. The original or real stuff is good THIS JUST SITS IN YOUR CLEAN HAIR AND LOOKS DOWN DIRTY. Does not absorb. I will never suggest anyone buy this online.
customer_reviews.author: Eve L

customer_reviews.title: It’s the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My mom use to use it everyday when I was a kid I absolutely love the smell. I recently bleached my hair, I have thick curly frizzy type hair, it really helps smooth everything out after blow drying or just by rubbing a little all over dry hair. My hair soaks up products but this is just a perfect formula it adds SHINE not greasy looking hair. Can use when wet or dry I prefer dry because I don’t usually style my hair with hot tools. It looks amazing when you do though!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my mistake for not examining your photos and dimensions for this product. This is a size for a baby or doll. I expected it to be similar size to my current Argan oil which I love and get a lot more out of, certainly size but also efficacy. I’m very disappointed and shall purchase the product I received previous to this order. I’ll use this product for travel as it takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Suzicue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hair Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty dry hair that is a bit frizz-prone the first day I wash it. This stuff works amazing! What I love about it compared to other hair oils is that it doesn’t make my hair oily! I have used other “hair oil serums” and they weigh down my hair. Morrocanoil tames my frizz and adds health to my hair without the negative affects of other oils. And as a great plus this smells AMAZING !
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lease

customer_reviews.title: Great smoother for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is very concentrated so don't use too much of it. I bought the small bottle because I just wanted to try it, but I'll be purchasing a larger bottle next time. It smooths frizz without being greasy and is actually a great value compared to cheaper oils because you don't have to use as much of it and it actually works and lasts all day. Some frizz treatments don't last all day- but this one does!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Little Bottle, Great results
customer_reviews.text: This little bottle of Moroccanoil is fantastic. I have curly hair that can be out of control. A couple squirts of Bed Head After the Party and a few drops of this oil mixed and run through my hair is miraculous. My hairdresser suggested this combo, it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Knock-Off
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is not authentic. I’ve been using Moroccan oil for years, the smell is off and the oil just isn’t the same.
customer_reviews.author: RobinH

customer_reviews.title: Pro hair Health, Con Style
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair, very curly, and this isn’t too thick for me. It does make my hair very soft & feel healthy, but it doesn’t do a whole lot for decreasing frizz in the bottom of my curls—doesn’t make anything greasy either. I’ll keep using this for healthiness, but I don’t think it helps with style. Sebastian Dark Oil and Living Proof Satin Serum are better at decreasing frizz, increasing shine and overall style
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it- want to know why? Read the review
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this product. I have relatively dry hair and was skeptical to put oil directly onto it... because I’m definitely not trying to wash, blow dry, and style my hair daily. No one has time for that. Luckily, this product gives my hair moisture without leaving it feeling oily- it’s actually a light product on the hair. I’ve used many of the products at drug stores, Ulta, Sephora, the salon... and every time I stop using this to change things up I just find that no other product is as good as it is. I’ve been using it (on and off) for 6 years. My hair is always better with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kodi_ko3

customer_reviews.title: Must have, fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I’ve used MO for years and have always loved it. The smell isn’t for everyone but I really like the way it smells. I have high porosity blonde highlighted shoulder length hair and follow the CGM. I use 2 pumps of this after my hair has dried and I SOTC. I will also use it for quick touch ups until my next wash day, with no other refreshing or touch ups until my wash day. I don’t know if it’s CG approved, but I also don’t care. I use it it in my daughters straight fine hair but lots of it and it works great. Super moisturizing and protective. Must have!
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! It renewed my hair!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, but least important, is the wonderful scent of this oil. I love it! I put it on after washing my hair then add more to the ends while drying. My hair has always rebelled against the humidity, but this oil has helped quite a bit. My hair feels softer and is more manageable; it just looks healthier. My hairdresser said to use a clarifying shampoo every once in a while if it seems to get weighed down, but that has not been necessary. This is an excellent product! This is the 2nd bottle I have purchased, the first time purchased on-line. I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: CompareB4Ubuy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hair oil
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy I decided to try out this hair oil. I find my hair dries faster and feels so soft and moisturized after using it. I had a trial size of a similar treatment oil from this line and fell in love with it...while this one is not quite the same (smells and feels different) I still really like it and would recommend/buy again. The smell isn’t too strong and the product distributes easily throughout damp hair (I can’t say about dry hair, as I don’t use it that way).
customer_reviews.author: InTheWoods

customer_reviews.title: Tames the clown hair
customer_reviews.text: I have flyaways and my hair threatens frizz with any humidity, but this product will tame most of those. I used this for years and loved it, but drifted away when I tried a different product that had a fruitier scent. But I noticed a buildup from the other product and decided to go back to Old Faithful, and have fallen in love with it again! Doesn't build up, has a light scent that dissipates fairly quickly (which I think is a good thing - lots of people are sensitive to scents, and I don't want to make anyone suffer with either my undressed clown hair or a scent).
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Strong Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love argan oil products. I have argan oil shampoo and conditioner (different company). I have argan oil styling products. I love the natural nutty smell of those products and what they do for my hair. I was really looking forward to trying this as an extra boost to give my dry, frizzy hair an extra boost... but the fragrance is overpowering. I immediately got a headache and couldn't get away from the smell. I'm so disappointed in this company. With everything we know about how fragrance is an irritant for so many people...why??!!
customer_reviews.author: D.DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was told to get this to help my daughters hair, which was dry and growing REALLY slow. Sure enough my daughters hair stopped breaking and was able to grow past a certain length. She has been struggling for 12 years to get her hair really past her shoulders. This stuff is pricey for such a small bottle, but amazing. When we finished the bottle I wanted to save money and bought a cheaper version... DON'T. It was not worth it. It didn't work as well and we could tell a difference instantly. This stuff it great, worth every penny. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rappleye

customer_reviews.title: In time and perfect ambalaj and original product
customer_reviews.text: Came in time, and is the original content,I use this product from years now so I can say is the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Nitu Nicoleta

customer_reviews.title: 76% of everybody likes this product it’s still a 4.5 star
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on here and on my hairdresser it seems to me like it’s a real Maroc in oil made in Israel I’ve bought Maroc in oil in the past that you said on my clients I don’t see any difference the older the oil gets maybe the darker it gets but I find it does the same thing to the hair. I will continue to use us but $44 is about right on The price and actually a bottle like this would cost much more
customer_reviews.author: Flori R.

customer_reviews.title: Not oily!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Morroracan OIl for years. The texture of the oil is light, the scent is AMAZING i just love how it smells, it is not overwhelming and it last a long time. When it absorbs on the scalp and hair, it does not leave an oily feel or film on the hair. I love the color of the bottle and the box it comes in, very warm and captivating. You only need to use a small drop just rub hands together and just work through your hair roots to tips and massage the scalp, just overall wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: EmV

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of all Moroccanoil products. However, the results are not fantastic. I have thick normal to dry hair, but with frizz. This makes the hair a little soft but it does not reduce or end the frizz. I have been a customer for over a decade now, but confess that other products work better on my hair such as Hask Matrix Argan oil.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkela

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite hair product.
customer_reviews.text: This hair oil is amazing. I use it once I’m out of the shower on the ends of my hair. I have a lot of hair but it’s pretty fine and prone to being dry/frizzy... this oil has completely fixed all those issues. After using this product my hair is shiny, smooth and feels fuller. I love this oil and so does my boyfriend— I have to keep him from stealing it! I learned that keeping it on the lower half of your hair is important or else your hair can look a little greasy after a day or so. Otherwise I haven’t had anything but good words to say about this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders with dandruff
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product by my then hair stylist years ago when living in Chicago and the harsh winters would case horrible issues with dandruff. Dab it on your fingers and massage into your scalp daily. Nothing else can compare and helps restore instead of blasting your scalp with harsh treatments. The scent is meh and rather strong. I don't care for it, but it's tolerable. For how well this product works, totally worth putting up with the scent.
customer_reviews.author: markmyword2

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is different about this bottle. We have been buying these for years. This bottle has no scent at all like all the purchases in the past. Only thing I can think of is that since this is the first (and probably last) online and not brick and mortar store bought that it is not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Broken pump spillage
customer_reviews.text: This product lasts a long time so I decided to put up with the broken pump till it snapped and spilled all over the floor...What a Mess!!! So now I need oil and pump replaced. The brown bottle was half full full and spilled everywhere. Thanks you for taking care of this mater..I am forlorn. Blessed Patti Ellis. upset customer
customer_reviews.author: Patti E.

customer_reviews.title: Almost no split ends!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift a year ago and have purchased another bottle. My hair is really soft and it cuts down on frizzyness. I have wavy hair that can’t make up its mind if it wants to go straight or curly and this oil keeps up. Depending on the humidity, I can go without any other product and let my hair air dry. I went 6 months without a haircut out of sheer forgetfulness and my beautician was surprised by how healthy my hair was. Very few split ends and overall pretty dang healthy.
customer_reviews.author: sarahs

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small version at first to try it. And now I am just in love with this product. 1: it smells so good 2: its hydrates my hair without making them greasy or oily 3: I use it everyday and I see the difference on my ends with and without it 4: became my hair’s best friend
customer_reviews.author: Rania F

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I be used this product three times now and I am totally impressed! My hair is so soft! I also use the intense hydrating mask and together it’s doing wonders for my hair! I was worried my hair would look oily or greasy sooner, but I have had no problems! In fact I feel like my hair looks better longer in between washes. Although this is the travel size, this bottle will last quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit possibility, amazon please look into
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before from a friend and was obsessed with the smell and wanted to purchase myself. Received this item only to find out it is a counterfeit or old or something like that. Does not smell like the well know Moroccanoil smell. I will only purchase products directly from Moroccanoil now as it is the same price and free shipping. Well worth the wait to know it’s the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Baker

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This brand is worth the money! My hair is long, fine, oily and frizzy all in one. This stuff smells amazing and takes the frizz. Plus u only need a little tiny bit so it goes a long way. 2nd review: this is liquid gold for your hair. I cannot live without it and will continue purchasing this product. I cannot tell you how nice this makes your hair feel, how good it smells and how much it helps with my extremely tangled hair. Not to mention how quickly your hair dries when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT THE REAL PRODUCT!!! Before I purchased through amazon, I would buy this product in a salon and it was AMAZING. I ordered through Amazon and now that I’ve used half the product I’ve determined it’s not the real product. My hair has never looked uglier. It has fallen more than ever before and there is breakage everywhere. The real product made my hair look so shiny and healthy. I am upset that it is now too late to even get a refund. SAVE YOUR HAIR DO NOT BUY FROM HERE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Lusturous Sleek Hair.....Every Time!
customer_reviews.text: If you want your hair to shine and look healthy with no frizz or flyaways this is the product to use. I've been using this on my hair for 10 years. It is moisturizing and helps to seal hair shafts so that they don't look frizzy. I have long hair that falls down my back and I use two dime-sized pumps to cover from the middle to the ends. I receive quite a few compliments and some have asked to touch it to see how soft it is. Best of all it holds up to the ocean air!
customer_reviews.author: View from the hills

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff saved my hair in Puerto Vallarta! When I ran out of my kenra serum (that I use everyday) I found moroccanoil at the hair salon in the resort we were staying at, they had a little travel kit of the shampoo, conditioner, hydration hair cream And Moroccanoil, between them all they made my hair FEEL and LOOK silky soft!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri P

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product formulation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product for years. This bottle had a different consistency and color. I’m convinced it is either fake or has been diluted. I compared to another bottle I still have, something is not right.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 10+ years. I have naturally curly hair that is coarse. This product tames my hair by moisturizing from the roots outward. I highly recommend this product. Not cheap but worth the money. Just takes 6 drops after washing hair
customer_reviews.author: Ms Em

customer_reviews.title: Fixes the damaged ends
customer_reviews.text: My hair has had years of color-abuse, causing it to get damaged at the ends. My stylist recommended to use this, and it has been fantastic. It makes my hair soft and the damaged portions don't feel as disgusting (still a bit disgusting, but much more manageable), and I can run a brush through my hair now. Before this, my brush used to get snagged and tear my hair apart. I think if I get a trim and use this product, it would keep my hair from getting damaged in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just ok, not worth the price. I bought it because of the hype and reading that hairdressers say it’s their favorite product. It works no better than Paul Mitchell’s super skinny serum or biologe’s exquisite oil. Honestly I’d prefer either of those to this product and you get way more for your money. This is a rip off. Much better off getting one of the products I mentioned or getting pure Argan oil. This Morracan oil’s main ingredient is a cheap silicone and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy fragrance smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been an argan oil user for years. When I purchased this product, I was very unpleasantly surprised by the heavy fragrance. Over the years, I tend to distrust manufacturers who use fragrance. It does nothing to help your hair and covers up the familiar nutty smell of argan oil which dissipates quickly when you use it. I found this formulation greasy and did not absorb quickly. I can't say it's fake, but I can say I can't tell it's real and I don't like the fragrance. I don't see the point of adding fragrance anyway. I won't purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 2 stars for drying because it doesn't dry your hair. In fact, I use it to manage my dry ends. This stuff really works and you only need a little dab. I have shoulder length hair that was permed months ago and the ends are just now starting to show signs of drying. This Moroccan oil Treatment works really well and it has a really nice, light scent to it. I recommend this for dry ends.
customer_reviews.author: Missy M

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Do Much
customer_reviews.text: This treatment doesn’t feel like anything special, imo. Disappointed because I heard good things about this product. For reference, I have thick, wavy, long hair. The scent is alright, but it definitely could be better. I don’t feel like the treatment dried my hair quickly, either, and I put a generous amount in my hair. It was a little moisturizing, but of course it isn’t extremely so. This was just very lackluster to me. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ♡︎ 𝚒𝚝𝚊𝚕𝚒𝚊 ♡︎

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and very dry, frizzy hair and this stuff is a godsend!!! The scent is light and very pleasing to begin with, so no problems with my allergies at all. Best of all, it tames my wild head of hair!! My hair is smoother and shinier without being overly greasy. If I blow dry or flat iron my hair, the moroccan oil helps keep the moisture in and makes my hair beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Browne

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Been using Moroccan oil for well over ten years and will never use anything else. I bring it with me when I get my hair done. Seals the ends and keeps the shine. Allows me to come through easily with no breakage and I have very long fine hair which is easy to damage.
customer_reviews.author: TracyAZ

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It works great on my dry frizzy hair however I saw this considerably cheaper on other sites. Unfortunately I saw it after I made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Susieque050

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had done my research before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: While I have used this product for some time after a friend gifted it to me, I just looked at the ingredients when I bought another bottle and notice that two chemicals/polymers are used as the main ingredients before Argan oil. It also doesn't say anything about animal free testing, which is important to me. So based on the chemicals used which I don't want in my hair and the research I found online, I'm going to search for an alternative product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair healthy
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the bomb for my curly hair,my hair comes to like with only 2 pumps of this oil, it smells divine, helps my hair stay bouncy, healthy and the shine is incredible. My favorite oil
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Sjostrom

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Shine and protection
customer_reviews.text: This is my ultimate go to favorite therapy for my very thick long and colored hair! It keeps my hair full of shine and helps protect any damaged hair from the color process. I personally apply this to my hair every night right before bed on wet or dry hair. I will always keep this in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C.

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fake. It smelled differently and was water mixed wit whatever other oil. The consistency was awful. I’ve bought from other vendor who no longer are on Amazon but this, is not the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchy

customer_reviews.title: The top breaks off you can’t use the pump have to pour it in my hand.
customer_reviews.text: I’m upset that the top broke off, can’t use the pump, have to take the pump off and pour it in my hand. I would love another pump please. That’s the only problem I have with this. I love this product. It always makes my hair soft using a round brush to help get the frizz out, my hair is healthier bc of this product. I’ve used this product for years.
customer_reviews.author: Angelbbz

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price and the REAL DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I just went back to this brand of hair oil, after trying cheaper brands. I cannot say it Emphatically enough, this brand of hair oil is worth the price. I was concerned about some of the reviews that said that it was counterfeit, but I’ve used this oil for years and the product I received today was well sealed and was the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: B Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Mostly made of CYCLOMETHICONE and DIMETHICONE,
customer_reviews.text: I bought because of reviews but this stuff is mostly CYCLOMETHICONE and DIMETHICONE, ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) KERNEL OIL, is 3rd ingredient. I threw this out. The “ methicones” only work for a short time and in the long term suffocates my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lestearce

customer_reviews.title: No longer contains argan oil.
customer_reviews.text: Moroccan oil is not the same ever since they reformulated it. Removing the argan oil was a big mistake. It still smells good but it just doesn't work the same. It does still function to help prevent flyaways but it just isn't as sleek as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dollie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very small. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Please pay attention to the size. This thing is small!! It comes with no pump. It has a cap and you have to pour into your hand. It is a great product and work awesomely and smell just ok to me. Not amazing like others have said. It’s not a strong smell either. Doesn’t feel greasy in hair. Just be sure not to use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Moroccon oil since a few years now. And although it’s a bit pricy than regular oil, it’s totally worth every penny. It also requires just a tad bit at every application so it lasts really long even for thick hair. I had been in search of a perfect oil before I found this and even after to try other products but this Moroccon oil is the best for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SPG

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Glass cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I will have to find a different seller. And another place for a lower price. It literally smells like a popular spray glass cleaner. It doesn’t feel the same or moisturize my hair the way I know this product should. This is my second order from them. It is my last. Sad. Because it’s hard to find now. And they know it is. That’s why it’s over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mermadedreams

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE REAL STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a lot of people on here say that this was fake product. Made me skeptical to purchase. I figured if it was fake, I could very easily send it back. Compared next to my daughters who purchased hers in her salon. Exact product. Same consistancy, scent...same everything. Everything on the packaging, bottle ...it's legit.
customer_reviews.author: D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates dry fuzzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever found for dealing with dry, fuzzy hair. Once applied it keeps hair shiny, manageable and styled through to the next wash. A teensy bit goes a long way, so it will last a while. Well worth every penny if you’ve been trying for years to find a product that keeps your hair looking moisturized and controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Michaels

customer_reviews.title: High-quality Argan oil
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very humid environment, and my thick hair tends towards frizz. Just a small amount (one pump) of this Moroccanoil Treatment keeps my hair looking smooth and sleek all day. I apply the oil just after showing and prior to blow drying. The scent is light and unobtrusive. I know this product is a bit expensive, but this bottle lasts me a very long time, and the quality of pure argan oil is worth paying for.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely disappointed. They say you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying this through my hairdresser for a couple of years when I came across it on Amazon and couldn't resist purchasing it at this price. Unfortunately, it's not the same product. The package looks the same but the consistency is thinner, the smell isn't right and the way it leaves my hair is definitely not the same. I was extremely disappointed. They say you get what you pay for, in this case you pay less and get less (quality).
customer_reviews.author: Jlbkd

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I had a sample vial which my beauty store gave me and it lasted for 5 months, I loved the oil so much that I decided to invest in an actual purchase. However, this product is more watery compared to the sample that I had which was thicker in viscosity. Still like this bottle alright and will use it. But probably won’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Sinnyaia Ptichka

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, good for dandruff!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It helps with dandruff if applied regularly. With very bad hardwater, it restores the softness of hair after a short amount of time. It is a very light oil, making hair look very shiny, but not greasy perse. Even when I don't need to use this product, I find myself putting it on just for the scent. It smells phenomenal!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: This product has enabled me to grow my hair longer than I could have as it keeps my ends from drying and splitting. I get compliments on the shine of my hair and the scent. I advise using only a dime sized amount or less ( too much makes the hair too greasy especially up near the roots and only needing such a small amount extends the use of the bottle ) on the lower half of the hair lengths where hair tends to be driest. Love this product and have stuck with it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie D Sikking

customer_reviews.title: Best hair moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: If you have African-American hair, then this is for you! Leaves my hair soft, moisturized, and smelling great. It protects with blow drying and flat ironing/curling afterwards. It doesn't weigh my hair down and gives it lots of body. I even like to put a few drops on my scalp in the winter months when my skin is more dry. Leave all those drug store products in the drug store and buy this. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Comtesse GigiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST hair oil!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff!!! It’s liquid gold! It brightens my mood and makes my hair so soft and smells so good!!! Better than any other options I’ve tried, although I love other kinds and use them in intervals, but this is my absolute favorite. I try to save it for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Forever love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this oil makes my hair smell and also how it leaves it really soft. I usually put a little bit on my damp hair before I start the day, and during the weekends when I'm not going anywhere I also put a little bit on my hair tips before I go to bed. Will continue to repurchase after I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella B.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This product I have used from early high school into college and continue to do so. It does wonders for my hair. It makes it extra sleek, shiny, soft, & moisturized. I have bought this multiple times. A bottle can last me a little over a year. I usually use 2-3 pumps of oil 2x a week. I recommend this product to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Dose not look like as pictured and the product was so fake
customer_reviews.text: Dose not look like as pictured and the product was so fake. My bfs sister has this so I decided to order it and let me tell you when I got it and took a good look is had a different language and was not a real product.... save yourself the favor and go to your local mall or salon and get it there.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Best oil I've tried! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite hair oil. I have a mix of textures in my hair because I'm part native where hair can be more on the course side (excuse the typo my phone wont let me correct it) this oil does wonders for frizzy hair and fast drying my hair takes hours to dry and with this my hair is dry in a half hour. Great to use every time after you wash your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Laryssa

customer_reviews.title: The REAL thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it about 10 years. I use no other products but this oil after shower. Keeps my hair shiny, moisturized and my scalp conditioned. A little goes a very long way. Excellent product and smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosker

customer_reviews.title: My hair dresser recommend this to me!, makes my hair look healthy and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My hair looks so healthy. Reminds me I need to order another bottle. However I paid for a bottle once and never received it and got busy and didn't make a claim. But product itself is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Smells SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this product ! My hair it’s pretty dry right now so I’m using the oil very often , and I can feel the difference already. Definitely recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but most of all it works! Along with Moroccanoil shampoo repair & conditioner repair, my hair is no longer frizzy, nor looking like straw! It also helps hair dry faster! Great product & worth the money! Save money by buying the larger container instead of the travel size I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used Moroccanoil for years and I LOVE LOVE IT! Last time I had my long hair cut my beautician asked me what I was doing different with my hair (I usually just have it trimmed) and I told her I was using Moroccanoil after each wash. She said “your hair is so much healthier keep doing what I am doing”. I love the way Moroccanoil makes my hands feel after applying it to my hair and I love the smell. My Grandkids Love to play with my hair because they say it is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have very fine hair. I often I don’t blow dry I just towel dry put the Moroccannoil in and go. Makes hair shiny and not greasy at all. Both my husband and I use this daily after shower. I don’t like to wash my hair daily, so after a shower I’ll just spritz my hair with water and rub a dab in my fingers and run it through my hair and good to go.
customer_reviews.author: HST

customer_reviews.title: I love Moroccan Oil!
customer_reviews.text: After washing my hair I put about a teaspoon of the oil on my hands, rub it around then rub it all over my hair then comb it through and let it dry naturally. I never use a blow dryer, curling iron, mousse or gel products on my hair, just Moroccan Oil after washing. My hair is so soft, naturally curly, and has so much body after using this product. Been using it for years. Just a little bit goes a long way to making my hair manageable. I give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Vader's mom

customer_reviews.title: Best hair oil I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this oil! I use it after washing my hair to moisturize, tame frizz and add shine to my hair. I also adore the scent. I hv medium texture hair which is past my shoulders and I can make a bottle last awhile. A little goes a long way. I’ve been buying this for years and don’t hv plans of stopping!
customer_reviews.author: Lola B

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for ANY hair.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy with short hair and absolutely love this stuff. Prior to me using this, my hair would stand straight, was very unmanageable, and felt like straw. After using this, my hair is so soft and I can go with out adding any other product to my hair. Highly recommend and I’ll be a repeat buyer of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Al_Gee

customer_reviews.title: Enhance the power with some treatment!
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks in: I bought this with the Moroccanoil styling cream. I am using it as my daily styler in the morning after I shower. The cream and treatment work nicely in connection, and I have noticed my hair stays hydrated and smooth. Since I have short hair, I use a tiny portion of each, and I have been satisfied with the results. I think the best part is the smell it imparts. Key takeaways: -Great smell -Consistent results and easy application
customer_reviews.author: C. Pendorf

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair shiny and youthful looking
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best! I am 48 and my hair has taken on that dry aging appearance. When I use this oil my hair looks soft, smooth and shiny! It’s like reminding the clock on your hair! You only need a tiny bit but it doesn’t leave your hair greasy or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SSC

customer_reviews.title: it mahe my hair feel soft
customer_reviews.text: his is a very good product to use on your hair. I use and still blow dry my hair and it comes out looking rease goo as if i had put some grease in my hair but did not. If i was to say what I did not like. Would only be the price.
customer_reviews.author: scherryl Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair product
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the oil is amazing, the softness of my hair for days is exactly why this is the best product in the market for hair oils. I have been using it for years, when I stop buying it my hair gets dry and brittle. If you are on a tight budget and can only afford a hair product, this is the one to buy. I little dap goes a long way and nurtures your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEATERS !
customer_reviews.text: The oil is great but the portion is terrible. They reduce the amount way down. CHEATERS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: haney armaly

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Treatment
product_meta.description:
Size:3.4 Fl OzMoroccanoil Treatment is the original award-winning hair product that created the worldwide buzz on argan oil and pioneered oil-infused hair care. Rich in antioxidant argan oil and linseed (flax) seed extract, this iconic hair treatment instantly nourishes and helps strengthen hair, leaving it shinier and healthier-looking with each use. Proprietary formula detangles hair and absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue. The foundation for all hairstyling, it creates long-lasting smoothness, increases manageability and speeds up blow-drying time. Also available in Light for fine or light-colored hair. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes. 

Ingredients 

Key Ingredients : 

Argan Oil: Extremely rich in tocopherols (Vitamin E), essential fatty acids and antioxidants that hydrate and nourish the hair.
Linseed Extract: Derived from flaxseed, a good source of alpha linolenic acid—also an essential fatty acid that helps improve the health of hair. 

All Ingredients: 

CYCLOMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE, ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) KERNEL OIL, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINUM USITATISSIMUM (LINSEED) SEED EXTRACT, CI 26100 (RED 17), CI 47000 (YELLOW 11). MOT01. Moroccanoil Treatment can be used in conjunction with all other Moroccanoil products as it is the foundation for styling.

BRAND STORY
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
